parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0 Safari/537.36

parameters.text:
=Analyze this invoice/receipt and extract the following information in JSON format:

{
  "name": "product name",
  "code": "product code or SKU",
  "quantity": quantity (number only),
  "unit": "unit of measurement (pcs/kg/m/l etc.)",
  "price": price per unit (number only),
  "total": total amount (number only),
  "supplier": "supplier name",
  "date": "invoice date"
}

Important requirements:
- For numeric fields (quantity, price, total): extract only numbers without currency symbols or units
- If any information is not found, use empty string "" for text and 0 for numbers
- Ensure the JSON format is valid and properly structured
- Focus on the main product information from the invoice

You have only two options to answer. The first option is if you have completed the task and recognized all the products, then make the message header "yes", and then the decrypted data in the above form in JSON format. And the second option is if you could not recognize, then send the answer "no". Do not give any other options, thoughts or advice.
